channel.title: Blogs on Api Avare
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Api Avare

item.title: How to set up a tent
item.description: The tent is an essential and useful camping gear for backpackers. But some frustrated campers undergo many difficulties when trying to set it up in the darkness after a tiring hike.

item.title: How to Pack Your Backpack Properly for a Hike?
item.description: You might have gone many backpacking trips around so far, but did you ever know there are standards to pack your backpack?

item.title: How to plan a backpacking trip
item.description: Backpacking trips can be serious fun with a tiny effort. A well-planned backpacking trip will allow you to camp in beautiful places to enjoy a richer, more immersive outdoor experience.

item.title: Backpacking Basics
item.description: Do you follow these tips as a Backpacking Beginner? Backpacking is the best form of low cost travelling to seek adventure, which blends hiking with back-country camping.
